channel.title: CVE Feed for MB connect line -- mymbCONNECT24
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MB connect line -- mymbCONNECT24

item.title: CVE-2021-34580|2024-09-17T01:41:24.149Z -- mb%20connect%20line -- mymbconnect24
item.description: In mymbCONNECT24, mbCONNECT24 <= 2.9.0 an unauthenticated user can enumerate valid backend users by checking what kind of response the server sends for crafted invalid login attempts.
